bioghist.p: John Scott (1824-1896) was a Republican Senator from Pennsylvania from 1869-1875. He had previously been a member of the State House of Representatives. He was an attorney prior to and after his political career.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of letters, circa 1874, from constituents and government officials to John Scott. Letters include requests for services, such as aid with securing pensions, positions, and payment of bills; letters of recommendation for appointments to government posts; requests for copies of legislation and other government publications; and several requests for seeds. The collection also includes a small number of manuscript and printed documents.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
